Plot: Love, money, ambition and music intertwine in Mozart in the Jungle, a half hour comedic drama that looks at finding yourself and finding love while conquering New York City. A brash new maestro Rodrigo (Gael Garcia Bernal) stirs up the New York Symphony as young oboist Hailey (Lola Kirke) hopes for her big chance.
Title: Mozart in the Jungle
Writer: Alex Timbers, Roman Coppola, Jason Schwartzman, Paul Weitz
Actors: Lola Kirke, Gael García Bernal, Saffron Burrows, Bernadette Peters
Awards: Won 2 Golden Globes. Another 3 wins & 3 nominations.
